mode.description: Video generation mode. 'std' is cost-effective, 'pro' has higher quality.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation. Can include references like <<<image_1>>>, <<<video_1>>> to reference inputs.

duration.description: Video duration in seconds. For text/image-to-video: 5 or 10. With video reference (feature type): 3-10. Ignored for video editing (base type).

end_image.title: End Image
end_image.description: Last frame image for the video. Requires start_image to be set. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png, max 10MB.

start_image.title: Start Image
start_image.description: First frame image for the video. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png, max 10MB.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video. Required for text-to-video. Ignored when using first frame image or video editing.

reference_video.title: Reference Video
reference_video.description: Reference video for style, camera movement, or as base for editing. Supports .mp4/.mov, 3-10s duration, max 200MB.

reference_images.title: Reference Images
reference_images.description: Reference images for elements, scenes, or styles (up to 7 without video, 4 with video). Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png.

keep_original_sound.title: Keep Original Sound
keep_original_sound.description: Whether to keep the original sound from the reference video.

video_reference_type.description: How to use the reference video: 'feature' for style/camera reference, 'base' for video editing.
